Message:
local tool = script.Parent
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")

tool.Activated:Connect(function()
	local bullet = Instance.new("Part")
	bullet.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 2)
	bullet.Color = Color3.fromRGB(255, 0, 0)
	bullet.Material = Enum.Material.Neon
	bullet.Anchored = false
	bullet.CanCollide = false
	bullet.CFrame = tool.Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, -2)
	bullet.Velocity = tool.Handle.CFrame.LookVector * 300
	bullet.Parent = workspace

	-- Add basic damage script
	bullet.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
		local hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if hum then
			hum:TakeDamage(25)
			bullet:Destroy()
		end
	end)

	debris:AddItem(bullet, 3)
end)
